contents: Article 8 (Accounting Manager) ① In order to take charge of independent work related to accounting, the following accounting staff are appointed for each accounting unit. Revised 2013. 2. 28., 2016. 11. 14., 2021. 8. 26., 1. Revenue-causing act manager in charge of income-related causative acts, 2. Expenditure causative act manager in charge of expenditure-causing acts, and Contract manager in charge of contracts, 3. Revenue manager in charge of income-related work, 4. Expenditure manager in charge of expenditure-related work, 5. Fund management manager in charge of fund management work, 6. Advance money for cash payment 7. Securities management manager who manages marketable securities, 8. Asset management manager who manages fixed assets, inventory assets, goods and other assets, ② Accounting manager under Paragraph 1 is A substitute, branch, or proxy branch may be appointed., ③ Accounting officers in subparagraphs 1 and 3, 2 and 4, and 3 and 4 of paragraph 1 cannot hold concurrent positions. However, exceptions are made in unavoidable cases such as insufficient capacity or management necessity.
